Reviews.Title: One Word - Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Tay "taylor--"
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesomely amazing. Its SO small and compact I can carry it ANYwhere, even in my jean pocket! I love it! Not only is it a great, small size- It takes really great pictures too. crystal clear everytime! I'm 15, and i take LOTS of pictures with my friends, and if your looking for a great digital camera, tiny in size, great- crystal clear images.... get this camera! I have also heard from other people that have it that They've dropped it a few times and it holds up great, its all metal-- so its pretty sturdy! Oh, and it also has a pretty big viewing screen! its great... like 2 and a half inch screen!!! && It has a long lasting battery! So it won't die when you need to take a picture! --amazing! This camera is grrreatt!

Reviews.Title: Excellent article
Reviews.Author: Alexander Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: An article of top quality and utility... and easy to use with quality materials for life and 100% recommended ...

8mp with 3x zoom

You Tube ready

ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-Z80PK 8MP 3x Zoom 2.6-Inch LCD Screen Digital Camera (Pink)
